about_the_game:
*More info and updates coming soon!*
HOLD ON TO YOUR HATS AND BRING SOME FRIENDS BECAUSE THIS IS GONNA BE THE RIDE OF YOUR LIFE

So exactly what is this so called Moonshine Madness?
It's an opportunity to race and beat your opponents!
Do you ever feel like you wanna play some quick game with your friends, get some laughs, spend some good time but also compete against them?
You know that kind of compete where you can laugh to their faces about how bad they are because they lost??
Well here is an option!
What better way to kill time than racing for a first place while throwing bunch of stuff into your friends faces!
But watch out, as there are many threats our the racetrack... who knows, chances are if you won't pay attention you just might..
dissapear?



Freatures:
* Racing map with randomly generated events!
There are terrain changes and events that are chosen randomly at the start meaning the map doesnt have to behave the same time as last time!
* No racing would be fun without items that just might give you the advantage you need.
Currently the game has 6 items that can be picked up from boxes and used to give you advantage! but watch out, since you wont be the only one using them.
* Interactive elements!
There are few objects and even animals that players can interact with, using them as traps or boosts.
* Matchmaking and custom lobbies!
The game has functional matchmaking as well as custom lobbies so no worries, you will always find someone to play with.
* Many more to come!
The game is in an active development and has many features planned such as different maps and gamemodes so stick around for this ride is just beggining!

name: Moonshine Madness

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Any CPU released after 2011
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 520
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: A competitive 8 player racing game which contains items that can be used as well as interactive objects and randomized map events. The game has online matchmaking and custom lobbies so no worries! You will always find someone to play with!
